attributes.action: take legal action on all MP's milking the expenses system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think that the government should take the maximum legal action on ALL MP's milking the system, at a time when the country is financialy crippled and the ordinary man is struggling to make ends meat, these MP's are rubbing our faces in it, they dont deserve the wage they get never mind the extra expenses, its the upper class robbing the lower class....they cant give money to worthy causes, the NHS etc but they can line their own pockets......get these criminals out......its a disgrace

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
